thread.title: White house says it will release budget on Monday that will include spending caps

title: White house says it will release budget on Monday that will include spending caps
text:
February 8, 2018 / 9:18 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago White house says it will release budget on Monday that will include spending caps Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The White House will release on Monday a federal budget plan that will incorporate spending caps, a White House spokesman said on Thursday. 
The budget proposal will “move us toward a path of restoring fiscal responsibility, it reduces our deficit by trillions of dollars” and incorporates budget caps and a tax bill, White House spokesman Raj Shah told a regular news briefing. Reporting by Jeff Mason; Writing by Eric Walsh; Editing by Jonathan Oatis
